items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Obsessed with this dress!
items.body: Obsessed with this dress!!!! Iâ€™m going to wear it for a formal night on my birthday cruise! The fabric is a crushed velvet and feels fancy! I am 5â€™2â€, 158lbs, and a 36E for reference. I ordered a LARGE and I think it hugs my current bra in the right way and also has a little peek-a-boo leg which is fun! I really appreciate the ruching in the mid-section for tummy control. Read more
items.author: Elle Deal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE!
items.body: I purchased this dress, with a few others, for Valentine's Day. Everything about this dress is a YES! I am a full figured, 5'8, 290 lbs with a 40DDD chest and the XL fit me like a glove! I've gained a lot of weight due to some health issues and am extremely self-conscious with wearing pretty much everything. I put this on and felt so pretty! I love the way it hugged my figure in all the right places. It was stretchy and not skintight. I chose the emerald green instead of a traditional red or pink for Valentine's Day, as I love the way I look in green. The color is absolutely perfect. The straps are adjustable so even with my 40DDD chest, I won't have to wear a bra with this. I can't say positive things about this dress. GET IT! Read more
items.author: JagsFan78

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stunning Dress for Anniversary Dinner
items.body: I bought this dress for my anniversary dinner, and it was absolutely perfect! The elegant design caught my eye right away, and it looked just as stunning in person as it did in the pictures. The fit was spot on and incredibly flattering, making me feel both comfortable and confident the entire evening. The material feels high-quality and has a nice weight to it, which adds to its sophisticated look. I received so many compliments throughout the night, and I couldnâ€™t be happier with my purchase. If youâ€™re looking for something stylish and classy for a special occasion, this dress is an excellent choice! Read more
items.author: Alicia Anderson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shape of green
items.body: Fit was true to size. Very soft fabric. Looks more expensive. Read more
items.author: Cheryl L

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Received a worn dress
items.body: Received this item that has clearly been worn as it has no tags and reeks of body odor. Iâ€™m hoping the replacement that I ordered will not have the same problem. Itâ€™s a shame because it is a nice looking dress. Read more
items.author: Tricia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress but definitely from SHEIN, worth buying.
items.body: This is such a gorgeous dress and absolutely worth it for any special occasion, date night or winter outfit. There are pros and cons to this dress. The size XL is more along the lines of a roomy size 14 in the United States. The large is more like a 10 to 12. This is definitely the type of dress you would see from SHEIN but itâ€™s being sold here for 2 to 3 times the amount you would get it for on the SHEIN app however that being said it is absolutely gorgeous. Itâ€™s very soft. I got an unbelievable amount of compliments in this dress. The stitching is decent. the straps are decent there is a little flap on the inside top of it that I had to tuck into my bra so again not the best quality but if you need something quick, thatâ€™s really beautiful. This would be a good choice. Read more
items.author: Erika Elaine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This dress is absolutely stunning !
items.body: I want to start off with how surprised I was at how heavy and velvety the fabric was! Iâ€™ve always wanted velvet winter green dress and this is it! Itâ€™s both sexy and sleek. Perfect for an office or holiday party. at I ordered it in a large just in case it ran small but I was able to pin it and it fit and looked perfect. Plan to order this dress but with how the fabric fits Iâ€™m going to order it and I am medium. I just love it so Iâ€™m gonna get it in a few different colors. Read more
items.author: brittanee fisher

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So many compliments
items.body: This dress is so flattering! I was easily the best dressed at the party. The dress hugs the body in all the right places. It's also very comfortable and well made. I think I need to buy it in other colors! Read more
items.author: Monica

short_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon Sleeveless Cocktail Ruched V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon Sleeveless Cocktail Ruched V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Burgundy, Army Green, Black, Navy Blue, Dark Navy Blue, Dark Red, Dark Green, Wine Red, Haze Blue, Purple, Peacock Blue, Royal Blue, Bright Red, Light Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
